name: Compass Family Resource Center
description: Compass Family Resource Center offers services that support family well-being including support groups, classes, parenting education, and case management, as well as providing basic needs items such as groceries, diapers, and hygiene supplies. Services: - Support groups and parent education classes available in English and Spanish, parent/child interactive groups and family activities - Case management - On-site child care while attending services at 37 Grove Street - On-site mental health suppo

Services: - Support groups and parent education classes available in English and Spanish, parent/child interactive groups and family activities - Case management - On-site child care while attending services at 37 Grove Street - On-site mental health suppo
howToGetIt: How to get connected: - In person: 37 Grove Street during operating hours to receive drop-in services or meet with a CFRC staff member - By phone: Call us at 415-644-0504 and follow the instructions to be directed to Compass Family Resource Center. Calls will be returned within two business days
